import AdminSidebar from "../../adminSideBar/AdminSidebar" import {useGetAllProductsQuery} from "../../../../features/productApi" import './ProductList.css' let ProductList = ()=>{ const {data, error, isLoading} = useGetAllProductsQuery(); console.log(data) return (
Product List
{!error && data && data.data.map((item,index)=>( ))}
# Image Name Price Action
{index+1} {item.name} {item.price}
) } export default ProductList
